name: To the earth (2022)
description:
Drive in the space!
You are going to go to the earth from mars. drive safe!

Gameplay

  • This game does not have special goal but driving forward.
  • Takes ~10 minutes each game
  • Easy control(WASD or arrow keys)
  • High-speed drifting (need unlock special car)
  • Enjoy the music and the vibe.

Features

  • 5 cars and 2 types of cars. normal and drift.
  • POV camera is ready
  • 3 unique stages

Story

It is just the ordinary commute of a man living on mars. drive safe to your work!
